properties.areaDesc: Ontonagon to Upper Entrance of Portage Canal MI; Black River To Ontonagon MI; Saxon Harbor WI to Black River MI
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 20 at 4:52AM EST until January 21 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
possible. Heavy freezing spray at a rate of 2 cm per hour or
greater possible, and may rapidly accumulate on vessels.

* WHERE...Saxon Harbor WI to Black River MI, Black River to
Ontonagon MI and Ontonagon to Upper Entrance of Portage Canal
MI.

* WHEN...For the Gale Watch, from late tonight through Tuesday
afternoon. For the Heavy Freezing Spray Watch, from this
evening through Tuesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in heavy freezing spray is
hazardous. Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic
components inoperative. Ice accretion on decks and
superstructures may result in a catastrophic loss of stability.
Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could capsize or
damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid or mitigate
hazardous accumulation of ice on their vessel.

Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON
